Package edu.concordia.app.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DedicationTokens
    This class is for creating the stacks for dedication tokens.
    FavorTokens
    This class creates Favor Tokens for the players to use in the game Favor Tokens are used by the player to exchange lantern cards
    LakeTiles
    This class is to create the lake tile object, the lake tile have four colors and some of the lake tiles have a platform marker,again lake tile can have adjacent top/bottom/left/right lake tile
    LanternCards
    This class is used to create the Lantern Cards.
    StartPlayerMarker
    The start marker is given to the player who has the start lake tile as red pointing towards him
    StartTile
    This program is used to create the Start Tile This Tile is the first tile of the game The Red color in the tile chooses the first player to start the game.
    Tokens
    This class is used to create objects of Tokens class which is used by DedicationTokens class.It would hold value and number of dots for each dedication token card.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LanternCards.Color
    An enum type is used for restricting the number of colors
